name: The Monk and the Warrior. The Heart of the King.
description: The King almost died. Pierre and Olivier tasted the Kings’ meal and later it was fed to the prisoners – and no man felt anything wrong. Strength and mind are leaving the noble ruler every minute, and enemies are ready to raise a rebellion, while the King is on the verge of life and death.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Intel Pentium IV @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 3000 + @ 1.8 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6800GT or AMD Radeon X1950 Pro (256MB VRAM with Shader Model 3.0 or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 6 GB available space
